column4: can someone help me here, i cannot connect to msn network with gaim, and messenger website says "All systems are stable and running" but "messenger upgrade required" due to "Microsoft's Trustworthy Computing initiative".. so is msn in gaim working for you?
install aMSN ... if you compile it from source, you are sure you can get the latest version
i will if you can confirm that you can connect with it right now
I'm using aMSN now with no problem, audio and video too
since when did amsn do audio?
if you compile it from source you get all this features... and if you install the last TCL you get anti-aliasing fonts too
I was surprised too... I installed it just some days ago and it rocks ;)
problem is, you have to install last tcl and tk ... a friend of mine give me them .... tcl 8.5 , tcl 8.5 dev ... tk8.5 tk.85 dev
they are not in default repos... you have to find the debian packages
ok np it will be worth it
yeah it sure will be worth it
installed the latest amsn snapshot it looks amazing! thanks man
